events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn’t fit me at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue was reviewed and classified as a refund request based on customer's message about returning the product.
Support agent Emma has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! I’m Emma and I’ll assist you with your refund today. Could you please provide your order number for verification?
To process your refund efficiently, may I ask if the jacket has been returned to our warehouse already?
Yes, I shipped the jacket back two days ago using the return label you provided in the confirmation email.
Thank you for confirming the return shipment. Once we receive the item and inspect it, we will initiate your refund immediately.
I appreciate your quick response and the clear explanation of the refund process. Looking forward to the confirmation.
We have received your returned jacket in good condition and processed a full refund to your original payment method.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received successfully and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you.
